section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Through civil partnerships, we promote common values and best practices in Business 
Sustainable development strategy of the SIVECO Romania gives a strategic role of partnerships - such as those with commercial entities, and also with non-profit organizations. 
We initiate, support and participate in dialogue with various forms social and business environment, organizations or institutions concerned with social progress, education and technological innovation.

goals__remit:
We want our global IT solutions, made in Romania, to generate to our clients positive change, prosperity, competitiveness and access to progress.  
Over the next years, SIVECO Romania aims at evolving from the status of most important Romanian software house to becoming one of regional leader in software integration, by developing eLearning, eHealth, eAgriculture, eCustoms, Enterprise Application Suite (EAS) and eBusiness solutions. 
Regional expansion 
Over the past 10 years, SIVECO Romania has pursued and achieved a true international expansion - in around 27 countries located in Central and Eastern Europe (many of them members of the European Union), countries within the Community of Independent States area, situated in the Middle East or North of Africa. This has been done by successfully launching, conducting and commissioning projects meant to bring progress in the field of education, health, agriculture and customs administration
